resources.string:
This is your Secret Recovery Phrase. Write it
down on a paper and keep it in a safe place.
You'll be asked to re-enter this phrase
(in order) on the next step.
This password will unlock your TradeGuardian wallet only on this device.
I understand that TradeGuardian cannot\nrecover this password for me.
Make sure no one is watching your screen
Tap to reveal your Secret Recovery\nPhrase
You can ONLY recover this wallet with your\nSecret Recovery Phrase TradeGuardian does\nnot have your Secret Recovery Phrase.
Your current wallet, accounts and assets\nwill be removed from this app permanently.\nThis action cannot be undone.
"Confirm that the item has been successfully delivered by the seller.
Confirm that the item given by the seller is incorrect or no item has been given.\n\nAre you sure? This action is irreversible and will lock both deposits.
Confirm that that the item has been delivered to the buyer.
Are you sure you want to cancel the trade? If you have made a deposit it will be returned.
